version_name: 9.4 now keeps your Shazams safe and in sync between all your devices. Just log in and we’ll back them up to your account

version_description:
Pssst…check out Shazam’s fresh new look and feel, and let us know how you like it!

The best of Shazam is now always a swipe away. Swipe left to see My Shazam; swipe right for your daily mix of new music from Shazam’s Discover feature. Looking for C

This update fixes a loading issue in My Shazam.

Thanks for Shazaming! We’re always working hard to make the app faster and better than ever. Did you know that Shazaming while holding your phone upright (in portrait) will give you the best chance of a match? Give it a try!

- “Shazams”, for a quick way to navigate and manage your full history - Play All, Add to Apple Music playlists, Buy

Check out your new Library menu at the top of My Shazam, where you’ll see:

- “Shazams”, for a quick way to navigate and manage your full history - Play All, Add to Apple Music playlists, Buy
